option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">
<PropertyGroup> <TargetFramework>net9.0</TargetFramework> <ImplicitUsings>enable</ImplicitUsings> </PropertyGroup>
<ItemGroup> <PackageReference Include="Bogus" Version="35.6.2" /> <PackageReference Include="FluentAssertions" Version="8.1.1" /> <PackageReference Include="Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing" Version="9.0.2" /> <PackageReference Include="Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.InMemory" Version="9.0.2" /> <PackageReference Include="Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk" Version="17.13.0" /> <PackageReference Include="SeedEasy" Version="2.0.3" /> <PackageReference Include="Soenneker.Utils.AutoBogus" Version="3.0.689" /> <PackageReference Include="xunit" Version="2.9.3" /> <PackageReference Include="Xunit.Priority" Version="1.1.6" /> <PackageReference Include="xunit.runner.visualstudio" Version="3.0.2"> <PrivateAssets>all</PrivateAssets> <IncludeAssets>runtime; build; native; contentfiles; analyzers; buildtransitive</IncludeAssets> </PackageReference> </ItemGroup>
<ItemGroup> <ProjectReference Include="..\..\1-Presentation\Bernhoeft.GRT.Teste.Api\Bernhoeft.GRT.Teste.Api.csproj" /> </ItemGroup>
</Reference> </ItemGroup>
</Project>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">

</Project>
